page.title: 15APPLETONWISKE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The village is very proud of its new school which opened on 1.11.83 to replace the school used since 1873.67 children attend.Mrs. Hart D.H. has 24 infants.Mrs. Burton has 20 infants and lower juniors.Mr. Hosie,who is a full time class teacher,as well as being Headteacher and P.T.A. Secretary has 23 older juniors.54 children come from Appleton the rest from the Rountons and Picton.Chairman of the Governers is Mr.Barry Askew,P.T.A. Chairman is Mr.Richard Stephenson.Parent Govener is Mr.Tony Sunderland.In July the school held a Summer Fair and Barbecue a Sports Day and 64 children,3 staff and 31 parents visited Beamish Museum which cost Â£1 admission per child.Two 57 seat coaches were hired from Abbots of Leeming at Â£50 each.by Jamie Pilling & Mark Peel.
